thoughts.text: I think it would be a good idea to start with something simple and familiar to me. I will list the files in the current directory to get a sense of what I have available.
thoughts.reasoning: Listing the files in the current directory will give me a sense of what I have available and what I can work with.
thoughts.plan: - Use the 'list_files' command to list the files in the current directory.
thoughts.criticism: I need to ensure that I am looking in the correct directory and that I am not overlooking any important files.
thoughts.speak: I will use the 'list_files' command to see what files are in the current directory.
